articles.title: Margot Robbie Barbie-fied Vivienne Westwood's Iconic Pirate Bride Dress - InStyle
articles.description: Margot Robbie attended the 2024 Australian Academy of Cinema and Television Arts Awards in a sparkly pink Vivienne Westwood gown.
articles.content: Margot Robbie isn't quitting her Barbie style just yet. With award season in full swing, and with multiple nominations for the highly-praised film under her belt, the actress is still paying homage t… [+1344 chars]
